mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device (deviceName, serial, deviceVerifyCode, deviceType, softVersion, productDate) VALUES (#{deviceName}, #{serial}, #{deviceVerifyCode}, #{deviceType}, #{softVersion}, #{productDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE device SET deviceName = #{deviceName}, serial = #{serial}, deviceVerifyCode = #{deviceVerifyCode}, deviceType = #{deviceType}, softVersion = #{softVersion}, productDate = #{productDate}, deviceStatus = #{deviceStatus}, isOnline = #{isOnline}, ipAddress = #{ipAddress}, newBeatTime = #{newBeatTime}, oldBeatTime = #{oldBeatTime} WHERE deviceId = #{deviceId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM device WHERE deviceId = #{deviceId} AND isValid = #{isValid}

SELECT d.serial from vUser v join userDeviceRelate u on v.userID=u.userId join device d on u.deviceId=d.deviceId
v.phoneNumber LIKE '%${phoneNumber}%'
and v.userID like '%${userID}%'
and v.isValid='1'

SELECT count(a.deviceId) FROM device a WHERE 1=1 AND a.isValid = '1'
AND a.serial like "%"#{serial}"%"
AND a.deviceType like "%"#{deviceType}"%"
AND a.productDate like "%"#{productDate}"%"

SELECT a.* FROM device a WHERE 1=1 AND a.isValid = '1'
AND a.serial like "%"#{serial}"%"
AND a.deviceType like "%"#{deviceType}"%"
AND a.productDate like "%"#{productDate}"%"
ORDER BY a.createTime DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
